org.objectstyle.cayenne.dba
Class TypesHandler

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.objectstyle.cayenne.dba.TypesHandler
public class TypesHandler
extends java.lang.Object

TypesHandler provides JDBC-RDBMS types mapping. Loads types info from an XML file.

Author:
Andrei Adamchik
